args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Stabilizer Bar May Detach and Damage Cables

Honda (American Honda Motor Co.) is recalling certain 2024 Acura ZDX vehicles.  The passenger-side front stabilizer bar bracket bolts may have been improperly tightened, which can allow the bolts to loosen and separate from the vehicle frame.  A detached stabilizer bar or bracket can damage the vehicle's high voltage cables or EV battery coolant lines.Damaged cables or coolant lines can result in a vehicle shutdown, causing a loss of drive power and increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 9.0
